CustomField.description: Auto-populated display name for the line item. Shows Subscription plan name or Type for standalone items.
CustomField.formula: IF( NOT(ISBLANK(Subscription__c)), Subscription__r.Price_Plan__r.Name & " (" & TEXT(Period_Start__c) & " to " & TEXT(Period_End__c) & ")", "Line Item - " & TEXT(Type__c) )
CustomField.label: Line Item Name
